page.title: 05Hind Leys Campus, Shepshed
page.content: There are three schools;{St.Botolph's, (268 children,4-10),The{High School (720 students,10-14) and{Hind Leys {Communiy College}(800 students,14-16). Leicestershire's policy is to utilise school resources for the community. The college provides education and leisure facilities used by over 2000 adults and children from{Shepshed}and villages to the north . There are meeting rooms for 70 clubs,a public bar,a lounge,a library,a youth centre, theatre,two sports halls,swimming pool and games fields. The college is organised by the Principal and the {college council,}which includes teachers,students and parents.{New {examinations,}the General Certificate of Secondary Education,taken at 16+, are being phased in. Adults are encouraged to return to learning through day and evening classes.
